import React, { Component } from 'react' import AuthController from '../controllers/auth' import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' class Login extends Component { controller = new AuthController() state = { username: "", password: "", rediredt:false } onSubmitForm = (ev) => { ev.preventDefault(); this.controller.onLogin(this.state.username, this.state.password) .then(res => res.data) .then(res => { localStorage.setItem("jwt", res.jwt) this.setState({ rediredt:true }) }) } render() { const { redirect } = this.state if(redirect){ return } return (
GuruAhli

this.setState({password: target.value })} type="password" className="form-control" placeholder="Password" />
) } } export default Login
